note:
Writer on productivity, well-being and online technologies. Open University student in Creative Writing and English language. Interfaith advocate. Dabbler in web design and learning to code!

Neurodivergent. Linux user. Left-Libertarian, mutualist. Non-conformist, Unitarian Quaker. Aroaceflux. Brentford FC and non-league supporter. Amateur radio licence holder. Japanophile and otaku!

I'm also an Ealing Commoner, with family links to Sheffield, who now lives in Somerset.

I'm also an Ealing Commoner, with family links to Sheffield, who now lives in Somerset, via a few years in Germany.
